question1.question: A developer needs to have records with specific field values in order to test a new Apex class. What should the developer do to ensure the data is available to the test?
question1.a: Use Anonymous Apex to create the required data.
question1.b: Use SOQL to query the org for the required data.
question1.c: Use Test.loadDataO < > and reference a CSV file in a static resource.
question1.d: Use Test.loadDataO and reference a JSON file in Documents.
